TopicTitle: How could i fly my plane again?

Articles.Content: I was attempting to fly around the earth while AFK when my computer shut down without my knowledge. I'd like to keep going.

The game makes autosaves, you should be able to load the most recent (or at least among the most recent) save file, whatever it's named, in your backup directory (\ksp\saves\yoursavename\backup).

What I'm not 100% sure of is if it autosaves while flying. If not, you don't have a mid-flight save and just have to start over

But in any case, a save file among the most recent ones in your backup directory is your best bet.
Thread moved to Questions, since it is seeking help rather than offering.
